scenes.description: Event wait screen for 'hololive 4th fes. Our Bright Parade DAY 2', displaying the performance hashtag, talent artwork, and viewing rules.
Informational slideshow showcasing a wide variety of official merchandise and collaboration items for hololive production and its members.
